tool_description: Extract texts from any images with great accuracy for any language.
name: OCR - Extract text image
title: OCR - Extract text image

api_list.name: url_image_or_base64_code
api_list.description:
In this endpoint you can put the url of an image or the base64 code that represents it.

The return will be the text contained in it.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ocr-extract-text-image.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ocr-extract-text-image.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ocr-extract-text-image.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ocr-extract-text-image.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
